statements: UPDATE website_traffic_reports SET user_age = 25, user_gender = 'Male' WHERE user_id = 101;
UPDATE website_traffic_reports SET source_url = 'https://www.example.com', user_gender = 'Female' WHERE report_id = 205;
UPDATE website_traffic_reports SET user_gender = 'Female', user_age = 30 WHERE report_id = 101
UPDATE website_traffic_reports SET user_id = 567, source_url = 'https://example.com/page2' WHERE report_id = 202
UPDATE website_traffic_sources SET traffic_count = 1000 WHERE source_id = 1;
UPDATE user_demographics SET location = 'New York' WHERE user_id = 5;
UPDATE website_traffic_sources SET traffic_count = 1000, last_visited = '2022-01-15 10:30:00' WHERE source_id = 1
UPDATE user_demographics SET age = 30, gender = 'Female', location = 'New York' WHERE user_id = 100
UPDATE website_traffic_sources SET visit_count = visit_count + 10 WHERE source_id = 1;
UPDATE user_demographics SET age = 30, location = 'New York' WHERE user_id = 5;
UPDATE website_traffic_sources SET visit_count = 1000 WHERE source_id = 1
UPDATE report_data SET unique_visitors = 500, pageviews = 200 WHERE report_id = 10
UPDATE website_traffic_sources SET traffic_source_name = 'Organic Search' WHERE traffic_source_id = 1;
UPDATE user_demographics SET user_name = 'Alice', user_age = 30 WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE user_traffic_data SET pages_visited = 10 WHERE user_id = 1 AND traffic_source_id = 2 AND visit_date = '2022-01-15';
UPDATE user_actions SET action_type = 'purchase', action_date = '2022-03-20 10:30:00' WHERE user_id = 3 AND action_id = 5;
UPDATE website_traffic_sources SET traffic_count = 500 WHERE source_name = 'Organic Search';
UPDATE user_demographics SET age = 30, gender = 'Male' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE website_traffic_sources SET traffic_count = traffic_count + 100 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE user_sessions SET end_time = NOW() WHERE session_id = 5 AND user_id = 10;
